Message:
The punks’d come to me,
but I didn’t know how to
deal with ’em...

They kept talkin’ to me
over and over again...
and it was only a matter
of time until I finally
opened up.

Next thing I knew,
I was their big sister.

The world’s messed up,
but things might be
a bit better now...

At least, that’s what I thought.
But in the end, the world’s
just a pile of crap.

A witch’s flames
burned everythin’ down—
the town, the waterways...
and even the orphanage.

I’ll never forgive ya,
Witch of Flames!

Whenever I think that,
I remember somethin’
Miss Val told me long ago.

“Violence doesn’t solve anything...
The true answer is forgiveness.”

I’m sorry, Miss Val...but...
I can’t... I can’t forgive this!
